author: Bruno Le Maire
title: 2105 - Ahead of the next Eurogroup meeting, Bruno Le Maire will hold a press conference on Thursday 2 April at 11:30 dedicated to international media
text:
Paris, 1st of April 2020 
N°2105 
 
 
PRESS CONFERENCE BY MINISTER BRUNO LE MAIRE 
 
Thursday 2 April – 11:30 
 
 
Ahead of the next Eurogroup meeting, Bruno Le Maire, minister for the Economy and Finance, will 
hold a press conference on Thursday 2 April at 11:30 dedicated to international media.  
 
The press conference will be livestreamed on Minister Le Maire’s Twitter account and images/sound 
for TV will be available through the SERT. The Minister will speak in English and there will be a 
possibility to ask questions. 
 
 
 
 
 
If you wish to ask questions, we will set up a dedicated WhatsApp group.  Please send us 
your name, your media, as well as your phone number to the following email address 
presse.bercy@finances.gouv.fr 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Press contacts 
 
Mélanie Voin                         +33 6 26 82 61 21 - melanie.voin@dgtresor.gouv.fr   
Dimitri Lucas  
 
+33 6 88 21 81 52 - dimitri.lucas@cabinets.finances.gouv.fr 
Clémence Midière   
+33 6 46 76 70 22- clemence.midiere@cabinets.finances.gouv.fr
